    • getCommonGoalConfig

      @NotNull private static Set<CommonGoal> getCommonGoalConfig(Class<? extends CommonGoal> c)

      Retrieves all common goals in a macro-group

      Common goals macro-groups are

      • Line common goal
      • Shape common goal
      • Stair common goal
      • Tuple common goal

      Parameters:
      c - the class representing the common goal
      Returns:
      a set containing all common goals configuration for a group
      See Also:
      • CommonGoal
      • LineCommonGoal
      • ShapeCommonGoal
      • StairCommonGoal
      • TupleCommonGoal

      Parameters:
      c - the class that will be mapped to the common goal
      Returns:

    • adjustScoringTokens

      @Contract("_, _ -> param2") private CommonGoal adjustScoringTokens(@NotNull Controller controller, CommonGoal commonGoal)
      This method takes a common goal and modify its scoring tokens, according to the number of players in the game
      Parameters:
      commonGoal - the commonGoal that will have a modified scoring tokens
      Returns:
